title: Ecstasy Mage
description: Ecstasy Mages, wizards who delve into the magic of love and sex, are feared for their primal power over others and hunted mercilessly throughout the Known Worlds.Tholena, a wandering Ecstasy Mage, has lived in fear most of her life, never daring to reveal her true nature even when she finds herself falling in love with a young man named Tully. When Tully's life is imperiled, she is forced to enter a dark and mysterious forest full of ancient secrets. Her sexual magic is tested to the utmost, and she discovers both her legacy and destiny as an Ecstasy Mage. But will it be enough to save the man she loves?
author: Paul Lucas
